item.title: Using Rancher to deploy Feel Good News app backend on Kubernets
item.description: TL;DR: this deployment was overkill but I learned a lot. Hats off to all the DevOps out there. Some days ago I launched an app on both iOS and Andriod with help from a friend (frontend is not my cup of tea). The backend, however, I wrote in python. The app is based on a very simple concept, use a sentiment analysis algorithm to filter out sad, negative, and gloomy news from the news feed.
